comments.comment: 04:47   better is semolina than flour. it does not burn. And i adding 20g of yeast and let the dough grow up for over 45minute. So best time is turn on a oven with stone on max temperature >250, then do a dough in about 10-15minutes, and let them grow.  Much better is do dought 1 day early, pack in foil stretch(first smear with olive), and next day take it from refridgerator out, for change temerature to normal (room temperature 20-22) then add ingredients and bake :)   Im doing pizza on that stone for over 4years
